Package menu

Class CustomCalendar

java.lang.Object
menu.CustomCalendar
public class CustomCalendar extends Object
CustomCalendar class provides the GUI of a Calendar based on the month and year for the user

  • Method Details

    • generateCalendar

      public void generateCalendar(int year, int month, ArrayList<Appointment> filteredAppointments)
      generateCalendar() to create the GUI of the Calendar for the user to view
      Parameters:
      year - for the year of the Calendar to present
      month - for the month of the Calendar to present
      filteredAppointments - a list of Appointment that are not meant for booking Uses LocalDate to calculate and print out the correct Calendar Appointment in the will be marked with one of the legends

    • legends

      public void legends()
      legends to show the icons in the calendar
